data.comment: Today's referee, Martin Atkinson, has blown to start the match.
Ollie Watkins for Aston Villa is whistled offside.
In the minute 2, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Liverpool at Villa Park.
Throw-in for Liverpool at Villa Park.
In the minute 4, Ollie Watkins puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Great play from Jack Grealish to set up the goal.
Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Liverpool's half?
In the minute 7, Aston Villa needs to be cautious. Liverpool have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Birmingham.
Aston Villa's Ross Barkley misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 8, Martin Atkinson awards Liverpool a goal kick.
Important block from the Aston Villa defence as Naby Keita fires in a strike for Liverpool.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Liverpool.
Aston Villa have a goal kick.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 15, Martin Atkinson signals a Liverpool throw-in in Aston Villa's half.
Liverpool's Roberto Firmino is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Aston Villa.
Liverpool drive upfield and Naby Keita gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Aston Villa defender.
Martin Atkinson blows against Aston Villa's Ollie Watkins for offside.
In the minute 20, Aston Villa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Liverpool awarded a free kick in their own half.
Roberto Firmino of Liverpool smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 21, Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Goal! Ollie Watkins extends Aston Villa's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 22, Jack Grealish instrumental with a fine assist.
Liverpool to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
In Birmingham Liverpool drive forward through Diogo Jota. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 25, Martin Atkinson awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Aston Villa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Liverpool's half?
In the minute 27, Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Diogo Jota for Liverpool drives towards goal at Villa Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Liverpool in the half of Aston Villa.
Corner awarded to Liverpool.
Liverpool's Naby Keita gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Aston Villa defender.
In the minute 31, Ross Barkley for Aston Villa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Liverpool goal kick.
In Birmingham a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 33, Mohamed Salah puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
Aston Villa's Ross Barkley gets in a shot on goal at Villa Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
In the minute 35, It's now 3-1 in Birmingham as John McGinn scores for Aston Villa.
Throw-in for Aston Villa at Villa Park.
Free kick Aston Villa.
In the minute 38, Liverpool's Virgil van Dijk has been booked in Birmingham.
Goal! Ollie Watkins extends Aston Villa's lead to 4-1 in Birmingham with a header.
That's a fine assist from Trezeguet.
In the minute 41, Martin Atkinson signals a Aston Villa throw-in in Liverpool's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
Goal kick for Aston Villa at Villa Park.
In the minute 44, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Trezeguet gets his shot on target but fails to score for Aston Villa.
Throw-in high up the field for Liverpool in Birmingham.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Liverpool close to the penalty box.
Liverpool's Andrew Robertson gets in a shot on goal at Villa Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Martin Atkinson awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Villa Park.
Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Liverpool in their own half.
The away team have replaced Naby Keita with Takumi Minamino. This is the first substitution made today by Jurgen Klopp.
At Villa Park, Douglas Luiz has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aston Villa's half?
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Aston Villa in their own half.
Aston Villa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Throw-in Liverpool.
Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of Liverpool.
In the minute 52, Aston Villa to take a throw-in in Liverpool territory.
Aston Villa are pushing forward but Ross Barkley's finish is wide of the goal.
Martin Atkinson awards Liverpool a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Can Liverpool get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aston Villa's half?
Martin Atkinson awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal! Aston Villa extend their lead to 5-1 through Ross Barkley.
In the minute 55, Jack Grealish with an assist there.
Throw-in Aston Villa.
Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Martin Atkinson signals a throw-in for Liverpool, close to Aston Villa's area.
Goal! Liverpool reduce the deficit to 5-2 through Mohamed Salah.
Great play from Roberto Firmino to set up the goal.
Aston Villa have a dangerous throw-in.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
In the minute 61, Curtis Jones is replacing Joe Gomez for the away team.
In the minute 62, Aston Villa are coming forward and Tyrone Mings gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Liverpool have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 64, Martin Atkinson signals a Liverpool throw-in in Aston Villa's half.
Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Goal! Aston Villa extend their lead to 6-2 through Jack Grealish.
In the minute 66, Ollie Watkins with an assist there.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in the half of Liverpool.
Jurgen Klopp (Liverpool) is making a third substitution, with James Milner replacing Roberto Firmino.
In the minute 69, Free kick Liverpool.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in their own half.
Liverpool to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
In the minute 72, Aston Villa drives forward and Ollie Watkins gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Liverpool in their own half.
Aston Villa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 75, Aston Villa take a comfortable 7-2 lead thanks to Jack Grealish.
John McGinn instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Liverpool at Villa Park.
In the minute 78, Takumi Minamino (Liverpool) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Diogo Jota of Liverpool gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Birmingham.
In the minute 80, Marvelous Nakamba is replacing Matty Cash for Aston Villa at Villa Park.
Ahmed Elmohamady is on a sub for Douglas Luiz for Aston Villa.
Aston Villa needs to be cautious. Liverpool have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 81, Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aston Villa pushes forward through John McGinn, whose finish on goal is saved.
Marvelous Nakamba gets his shot on target but fails to score for Aston Villa.
In the minute 82, Aston Villa to take a throw-in in Liverpool territory.
Diogo Jota (Liverpool) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Takumi Minamino of Liverpool is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 85, Ollie Watkins (Aston Villa) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
Jack Grealish (Aston Villa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Liverpool have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
In the minute 87, Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Liverpool's half?
Dean Smith is making the team's third substitution at Villa Park with Bertrand Traore replacing Trezeguet.
Throw-in for Liverpool at Villa Park.
In the minute 88, Ball safe as Liverpool is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Martin Atkinson signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Martin Atkinson.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Birmingham a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Trent Alexander-Arnold (Liverpool) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The second-half is over. The match ends 7-2.
Marvelous Nakamba for Aston Villa has been booked by Martin Atkinson and receives a first yellow card.
